Microphone Access Required

To use the "Hey Cue" wake word, you need to grant microphone access.

Important: If you see "Requested device not found" errors, you may need to grant microphone permission at the macOS system level:

  1. Open System Settings → Privacy & Security → Microphone
  2. Ensure Google Chrome is enabled
  3. If Chrome is not listed, try using the microphone in another app first
  4. Then reload this page and click the button below

Permission Granted! You can verify this tab is closed.
